settings.title: 1. Do you offer free shipping to Australia?
settings.content:
Yes, we offer free shipping to Australia. If you have any further questions or need assistance, please contact our Customer Care Team at support@lanyspace.com. Additional fees or delivery restrictions may apply for remote areas.

Please note: We do not ship to Australia Post PO Boxes, Parcel Lockers, Parcel Collect, or Locked Bags.
We ship from Los Angeles, United States.

settings.title: 3. Are taxes and duties covered? (Australia)
settings.content: Customers are responsible for any applicable sales taxes (if charged). All import duties on orders shipping to Australia are fully covered by Lany Space.

settings.title: 4. How long will it take for my order to ship and arrive in Australia?
settings.content: Your order will typically arrive within 30–35 days from the date of purchase, depending on the carrier and your location.

settings.title: 5. Do you ship to PO Boxes or Parcel Lockers?
settings.content: Unfortunately, our shipping couriers cannot deliver to Australia Post PO Boxes, Parcel Lockers, Parcel Collect, or Locked Bags. Please provide a residential or business street address. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

settings.title: 6. Which carrier is used for shipping?
settings.content: We primarily use ARAMEX for shipping to Australia. Please email us at support@lanyspace.com if these options do not work for you.

settings.title: 7. How do I change my shipping address?
settings.content: If your order has not been shipped, please email us at support@lanyspace.com with your order number and the updated shipping address. However, if your order has already been shipped, we are unable to assist with address changes. In such cases, please contact the carrier directly for assistance.

settings.title: 8. What if the shipping shows delivered but I don't receive the package?
settings.content: We will assist you with the carrier while the tracking shows the package is in transit until it is delivered. However, if the package shows as successfully delivered, we cannot assist further. Please understand that Lany Space is not responsible for issues such as lost packages in apartments/houses or package theft.

settings.title: 9. May I place an order first and then request a delayed shipment?
settings.content: Yes! Please email us with the order number and the specific date you would like the order to be shipped before it has been fulfilled. However, we cannot assist if the order has already been shipped.

settings.title: 10. Do you ship internationally?
settings.content: We currently ship to the United Kingdom, Hong Kong, China, the United States, Australia, and Canada.

settings.title: 1.  What is your return policy for Australia?
settings.content:
Our Return Policy covers all products sold by Lany Space. If a product does not meet your expectations, you may return it within 15 days of receiving the product. To initiate a return, first of all please submit a return request in your account. Please note that specific items, such as custom-made or personalized products, final sales, flash sales, wholesale items, clearance, are not eligible for return. Once your return is received and inspected, we will email you to notify you of its receipt. If your return is approved, a refund will be processed and automatically applied to your credit card or original payment method within a certain number of days.

Please note that a restocking fee of $68 AUD will be charged for each item over $180 AUD, and a restocking fee of $38 AUD will be charged for each item below $180 AUD. To be eligible for a refund, the original item(s) MUST be in new condition (includes the original plastic bag) and returned without:

• Traces of pet hair or allergens

• Any marks

• Indications of use, laundering, or inadequate maintenance

• Defects or discolorationsPlease be aware that every returned item undergoes a comprehensive evaluation, and a refund will not be issued in a state that prevents it from being resold.

Please return the product within 30 days after we approve your return to avoid any late fees or additional charges. Overdue will automatically close returns without any refund.

Steps for Returning the Product:

1. Prepare the Product: Please make sure the product is in the same condition as when you received it, along with packaging.

2. Drop-off Location: Use the pre-paid return label and drop off the product to any of the corresponding post officenearby.

3. Receipt Confirmation: Upon successful return, you'll receive an email confirmation from us.

Please ensure that the original packaging or similar packaging is used to ship the returned item(s) to prevent damage during transport. If you have any further questions or need assistance, don't hesitate to contact our Customer Care Team at support@lanyspace.com.

For customers residing in Australia: If you received your order within the last 15 days, we offer a prepaid return shipping label to assist you with the return process. However, please note that a restocking fee of $68 AUD will be charged for each item over $180 AUD, and a restocking fee of $38 AUD will be charged for each item below $180 AUD.

Yes, and please ensure that the original packaging or similar packaging is used to ship the returned item(s) to prevent damage during transport. You do not have to use the original outside box if it is damaged or too large to fit in your car, but please ensure the item is well protected, as this will affect the return.
Unfortunately, exchanges are not currently available for customers residing outside the U.S. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
Final sale and customized products are not eligible for return.

We issue partial refunds for a variety of reasons, most commonly you may receive a partial refund for the following reasons:

To receive a full refund, the original item MUST be in new condition and returned without:

All returned items are thoroughly inspected, and any item(s) returned in a condition deemed as no longer sellable will not be refunded. In addition, the returned item(s) must be shipped back in the original packaging or similar packaging to prevent item(s) from damage while in transport. For additional questions regarding your partial refund please reach out to at support@lanyspace.com.

Returns will not be accepted or a partial refund may be issued if the returned item(s) show traces of pet dander or fur, dirt or grass stains, signs of wear, washing, improper care, damage, or stains.

Additionally, the returned item(s) must be shipped back in the original packaging or similar packaging to prevent damage during transport.

If you have any additional questions or require further assistance, please reach out to support@lanyspace.com.
